name: PAT_ENC_HPF_LINK
description: This table contains information about Hospital Professional Fees (HPF) encounters generated by ADT admissions and linked to single patient encounters. Special facility and ADT setup is required to automatically generate HPF encounters from ADT admissions.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LINKED_HPF_CSNS
columns.description: A multiple response list of all contact serial numbers for hospital professional fee encounters that were created by this patient encounter.

columns.name: LINKD_HPF_ENC_SA_ID
columns.description: The service area in which the corresponding hospital professional fee encounter was created.
